Pre-Game Insights: Casey Mize hasn't been too bad over his last three starts, giving up a combined six earned runs in 16.2 innings on 14 hits and four walks
Mize is 1-0 in those three starts
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers will meet the Orioles after this series
Seven of the Rockies' last eight games have gone UNDER the total runs line
Three of the last four games between the Rockies and Tigers have gone OVER the total runs line
Others: Riley Greene has recorded at least one hit in each of his last 10 appearances against NL West opponents that held a losing record
Casey Mize has recorded four or more strikeouts in each of his last three home appearances
